page.title: 18GOLF CLUB,SANDIWAY
page.content: The club has competitions every week with prizes for each and one main tournament where people from other clubs come to play. For the competitions the course is kept in good condition by 6 full-time groundsmen. The shop there is owned by a professional golfer. People can have lessons and hire or buy all golfing equipment from him. Each Sunday he gives lessons to enthusiastic juniors. In the future new changing-rooms and lounges for the lady members are to be built. {REPORTERS FOR THE TEXT PAGES:} John Alexander, John Bradshaw, Rachel Burton, Jeremy Case, Tara Copp-Barton, Sarah Diggle, Claire Mather, Claire Pickering, Mark Scott, Graham Watson, Melanie Short, Andrew simmons, Stephen Snelson
